about.title: Explore the power of {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) offers a comprehensive platform for embedding customizable text signatures, making document workflows smoother. Personalize the content and appearance of signatures across documents to boost efficiency and enhance document management.

more_features.title: Complete text signature management
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} helps you manage document workflows by adding custom text signatures to popular formats. Easily control the look, placement, and content of signatures to suit your needs.

feature_1.title: Flexible document signatures
feature_1.content: Add various signature types—text, images, barcodes, QR codes, and stamps—to any document page. Use metadata to include hidden information and secure your files with digital certificates.

feature_2.title: Verify and search signatures
feature_2.content: Use advanced tools to check the integrity of your signed documents. Search and analyze all signatures in a file for further validation.

feature_3.title: Edit or remove signatures
feature_3.content: Easily update the content, appearance, or placement of existing signatures. Remove outdated signatures to keep your documents current.

feature_4.title: Specialized text signatures
feature_4.content: Apply document-specific text signatures, like watermarks for Word files or stamps for PDFs, adding an extra level of control and customization.

formats.title: Embed text signatures in multiple formats
formats.description: With the {{EnvName}} API, you can add text signatures to various Office documents, giving you full control over the document lifecycle and improving security.

operations.title: Advanced signature features
operations.description: Our API supports complete lifecycle management for seven signature types, allowing you to create, manage, verify, and customize your signatures with ease.
